main event: A pilot reported seeing an unusual object in the sky over Poplar Bluff, Missouri, which was later determined to be a weather balloon.
interesting points: The pilot described the object as a 'large silver marble' and claimed it was hovering for about five hours., The object was observed by local airport manager Clay Greenwalt, who stated that it did not appear to be moving., Officials confirmed no experimental balloons or aircraft had been released in the area that day., The sighting sparked significant interest and was reported on in the local newspaper., The object was reported to be at a high altitude exceeding 40,000 feet.
witness description: Pilots from the 155th Air National Guard Squadron
